name: Andrew Roberts
description:
I like family life but just missing that woman to complete it. All i have ever wanted is to be settled in a good relationsh ip/marriag e for life. I’m very caring,loving and loyal, thou ghtful,rom antic down to earth kinda person. I have a lot of love to give to the right person. Need a family orientated woman,honest ,godly,fun ny,caring woman.
I am seeking a sweet, attractive woman who loves the Lord, a woman I can love unconditionally, devote myself to, pray with, protect, and to have a very close, loving, lasting relationship with. I want a woman who will become my best friend, soul mate, wife, and mother for our children. I want her to be loving, faithful, affectionate, kind, considerate, unselfish, sweet, romantic, sincere, with a sense of humor, and some intelligence.
